thread.title: Pricey but overall a very nice hotel in a good location
thread.title_full: Pricey but overall a very nice hotel in a good location - Review of Hotel Scribe Paris Opera by Sofitel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sxght
title: Pricey but overall a very nice hotel in a good location
text: The location of the hotel is very good as it is situated near the shopping area - galeries lafayette, printemps are about 5 mins walk away and st honore shopping area about 15 mins walk. And you will have access to public transport as well. Room size is above average compared to others in european cities. Bed is comfy enough and the bathroom size is average. Bathroom is very clean and they gave excellent amenities. Wifi connection is strong. Breakfast selection is excellent as well. Overall, a very nice hotel but the price is on the high side.
